name: Future Indonesia Truck Sim: Hi
description:
Future Indonesia Truck Sim: Hill Driver is adventurous cargo transport game, in which your main objective is to drive load logging cargo truck to their destination
Features:
- Realistic truck physics
- Traffic cars system
- Different trucks to drive
- Truck customization
- Day & night cycle
- Realistic damage, fuel and fatigue
- Tilting, buttons and steering wheel controls
- Interior Camera for all the trucks!
